name: Lunch Biscuits
author: TMacD
summary: Biscuits with various fillings - perfect for kids' lunch boxes! Once cooled, store biscuits in a sealed container or freeze.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated buttermilk biscuit dough, each cut into small pieces
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Spray 8 muffin cups with cooking spray
Mix Cheddar cheese and ham together in a bowl; fold in biscuit dough pieces
Add pizza sauce and lightly mix
Spoon mixture into the prepared muffin cups
Bake in the preheated oven until biscuits are puffed and browned, about 20 minutes
Cool for 10 minutes before removing from muffin cups
